planets.name: Mercury
planets.description: This industrial powerhouse produced the majority of goods for the system, before the Sun absorbed it at least.

planets.name: Venus
planets.description: Initially thought to be a tropical paradise, this planet is quite the opposite.

planets.name: Earth
planets.description: The shattered remains of this former planet can be found drifting through space, or in souvenir shops around the galaxy.

planets.name: Mars
planets.description: It wasn't until the Humans colonized Mars that they experienced their mutually assured destruction doctrines.

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.description: A few survivalists thought they could endure Jupiter's surface. No one has tried since.

planets.name: Saturn
planets.description: Scientists were disappointed to see their probe go in one side and out the other. There's no surface on this planet.

planets.name: Uranus
planets.description: The cold temperatures on this planet are nothing compared to the monsters lurking in the depths.

planets.name: Neptune
planets.description: With the growing Sun, the ice here is beginning to melt.
